text:
vIqryE# paqSuShuq prati# tiShThanti ShaT-tri(gm)Sad rAqtrO Ba#vatiq ShaTtri(gm)#SadakSharA bRuhaqtI bAr.ha#tAH paqSavO# bRuhaqtyaiva paqSUnava# rundhatE bRuhaqtI Canda#sAq(gg)q svArA$jyamASnutA-SnuqvatEq svArA$jyaqM ~Mya EqvaM ~MviqdvA(gm)sa#H ShaTtri(gm)Sad rAqtramAsa#tE suvaqrgamEqva lOqkaM ~Mya#ntyatirAqtrAvaqBitO# BavataH suvaqrgasya# 
lOqkasyaq pari#gRuhItyai || 24
(aqtiqrAqtra - Oja#syEqva - ShaTtri(gm)#Sacca) (A6)
